metadata.title: CVE-2013-6501 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: The default soap.wsdl_cache_dir setting in (1) php.ini-production and (2)php.ini-development in PHP through 5.6.7 specifies the /tmp directory,which makes it easier for local users to conduct WSDL injection attacks bycreating a file under /tmp with a predictable filename that is used by theget_sdl function in ext/soap/php_sdl.c.

criterions.comment: php7.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
